name: English Grammar Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of English grammar

data.question: Which sentence is grammatically correct?
data.explanation: The correct form uses 'doesn't' (does not) with third person singular subjects.

data.question: What is the past tense of 'go'?
data.explanation: 'Went' is the simple past tense of 'go'. 'Gone' is the past participle.
